mapper.insert: insert into board_tb (category_id, title, content, author_id, created_at) values (#{categoryId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{authorId}, now())
mapper.update: update board_tb set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where id = #{id} and author_id = #{authorId}
mapper.delete: delete from board_tb where id = #{id} and author_id = #{authorId}
mapper.select: select b.*, u.nickname from board_tb as b left join game_tb as g on b.category_id = g.id left join user_tb as u on u.user_id = b.author_id where category_id = #{categoryId} and b.title like CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') order by b.created_at desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
